backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, authorization checks, and Bible story/verse data with initial story seeds and image support via ExternalBlob.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature update affecting StoryDetailPage with related components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, styles, and deployment docs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites and steps to publish the current draft build to production on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS defining OKLCH-based theme variables, light/dark mode palettes, and base Tailwind styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with favicon links and mounting root container.
frontend/PRODUCTION-RELEASE-CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive checklist for verifying, executing, and validating a production release, including rollback criteria.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages in the shared SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users for their display name and saving it via backend profile APIs.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the main site layout with header navigation, footer, and profile/login elements.
frontend/src/components/story/ImageUploa: Handles image display and admin-only upload with validation, progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/story/PublicImag: Displays an image from an ExternalBlob and shows a fallback UI if loading fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for profiles, admin status, stories, verses, daily verse, and image uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClientProvider, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DailyVersePage.tsx: Fetches and displays the daily verse with loading, error, and refresh UI states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with navigation cards linking to daily verses, stories, and testaments.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of Bible stories with loading and error states and navigates to story detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed story content including image upload, scripture verses, and summary with navigation back to the stories list.
frontend/src/pages/TestamentPage.tsx: Displays verses for either the Old or New Testament with loading/error handling and navigation to verse detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/VerseDetailPage.tsx: Shows details for a single verse, including text and optional image, with navigation back to its testament list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography/container/animation plugins, and extended theme settings for fonts, layout, and UI animations.
